algorithm_technique: Dynamic programming to count playlists based on previously played songs and unique songs.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the number of playlists of a certain length with specific song repetition rules.
problem_summary_technical: DP state dp[i][j] represents playlists of length j using i unique songs, considering the k-repetition rule.
key_insights: The problem can be solved using dynamic programming by considering the choices at each step of playlist creation.
The recurrence relation considers two cases: playing a new song or playing an old song.
The modulo operation is crucial due to the large potential answer.
